DayCommon.DayCommon_Area500_Briefing_Check_Area001:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="772d7baf54d043f9811e64957a251c13" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]I was worried when I saw the smoke
billowing out of the S.S. Shepherd.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I didn't
know how things would shake out...

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="9dbf3c4904004fc68cc00e660163acfe" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Thank goodness we were able to make
the repairs.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="9dbf3c4904004fc68cc00e660163acfe" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly2"/]I'd been roughing it for long enough![etc:Wait frame="15"/]
And there's something to be said for
finally having a properly prepared meal.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="a84239aaa51d4449a1f2c534f0e64a50" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]And you're sure we have enough
emergency rations, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal01"/]Collin[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="a84239aaa51d4449a1f2c534f0e64a50" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly2"/]We have no idea how long we'll be stuck
on this planet.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="1c8f94b22b0e4625a22536aa21767204" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]I counted our stock three times,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but I can
do it again...

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="6e86c0f0a197440aba5dae813e4b3400" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Excellent plan.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Now, [etc:Wait frame="8"/]tomorrow we'll focus
on recon,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] so you and [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] need to eat
and get lots of rest, [Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/].[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6e86c0f0a197440aba5dae813e4b3400" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="CommandFaceOnly"/]But don't forget to review your [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]missions
[System:Color name="Default"]before heading to bed.
DayCommon.DayCommon_Area500_Briefing_Common_00_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="8cc430d6fdb44f7c979c85c5e8b34ddf" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Excuse me, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal01"/]Collin[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="8cc430d6fdb44f7c979c85c5e8b34ddf" Scale="1"/]Remind me again how I access the
[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Rescue Journal[System:Color name="Default"] on the Tablet?
DayCommon.DayCommon_Area500_Briefing_Common_00_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="b96c8d3c80e544318390216a38d3762a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Of course, Captain.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b96c8d3c80e544318390216a38d3762a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]First, press [PictureFont:IconData key="STAB" scale="0.66"/] to open the Tablet,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
then tap [PictureFont:IconData key="Cancel" scale="0.66"/] to open the Tablet Menu.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b96c8d3c80e544318390216a38d3762a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]From there, navigate down to the
Rescue Journal app and open it up.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b96c8d3c80e544318390216a38d3762a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]If you want to be able to access the app
immediately in the future,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] press [PictureFont:IconData key="Option" scale="0.66"/] to
assign it to a [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]shortcut [System:Color name="Default"]button.
DayCommon.DayCommon_Area500_Briefing_Common_00_P02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="84d43b327b9e4c5f95b25661309e0a1c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Ah![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Thanks for the refresher.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="84d43b327b9e4c5f95b25661309e0a1c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Each section of the Rescue Journal is full
of wisdom passed down from generations
of captains who came before me.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="84d43b327b9e4c5f95b25661309e0a1c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]Please make it a habit to check it out
regularly, and take their lessons to heart.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Understood, [Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/]?
DayCommon.DayCommon_Area500_Briefing_Common_00_P03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="6095cf4457ec433896d36e514826adb8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Just like the captain...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]when she remembers
how to access it.
DayCommon.DayCommon_Area500_Briefing_Common_01_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="57326caa724e439eac4360b8adff3cc1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Captain,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I've noticed something while
observing the Pikmin...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="57326caa724e439eac4360b8adff3cc1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]If you leave them unplucked,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the sprouts
eventually bloom into flowers.
DayCommon.DayCommon_Area500_Briefing_Common_01_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="40aa285c575b430db80faee087cc326a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Hmm.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] They really do share so much
of their biology with plant life.
DayCommon.DayCommon_Area500_Briefing_Common_01_P02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="a22281e971304a32b3c60323d01276be" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]So,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] do you think this new information could
help you get over your fear of Pikmin?
DayCommon.DayCommon_Area500_Briefing_Common_01_P03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="7c89796c6ab74279bc7a15792d927926" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]Fear of Pikmin?![etc:Wait frame="8"/] What?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I've never been
afraid of Pikmin![etc:Wait frame="15"/] [System:Color name="NoVoice" ]And I'll prove it...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]when I
finally get up the nerve to touch one.[System:Color name="Default"]
DayCommon.DayCommon_Area500_Briefing_Common_02_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="1ce884a1231246c2bc86fa27b43c9062" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I just remembered.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Wasn't [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal03"/]Russ[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] the one
who developed our Tablets?
DayCommon.DayCommon_Area500_Briefing_Common_02_P01: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="7d446438398848fbbc63f57460809416" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Yes![etc:Wait frame="8"/] He was the mastermind behind them.
DayCommon.DayCommon_Area500_Briefing_Common_02_P02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="b47729cbf3d04171b25a34983904c0e5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Kee-hee-hee![etc:Wait frame="8"/] And I'd be delighted to tell
you about some of my favorite Tablet
features![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Is now a good time?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Excellent![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b47729cbf3d04171b25a34983904c0e5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="AngryFaceOnly2"/]That spiky symbol you may come across
on the Radar Map denotes a creature,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] and
the star shows that there's a treasure![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b47729cbf3d04171b25a34983904c0e5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02"/]How did I come up with this system?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Well,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
a spike is Mother's favorite symbol,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] and
the star references her trademark hairpin.
DayCommon.DayCommon_Area500_Briefing_Common_02_P03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="6a15e91b6ded4edab4cdc8a7cc878a2d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]We've all learned a lot today.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Mostly that
[Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal03"/]Russ[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] really...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]really loves his mother.
DayCommon.DayCommon_Area500_Briefing_Common_03_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="7ff98f19b5ba45debd15947f2a6a2303" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]You're doing great out there![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Now we only
have[System:Color name="Emphasis" ] 3 Rescue Officers [System:Color name="Default"]left to find.
DayCommon.DayCommon_Area500_Briefing_Common_03_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="8f9a60fd9c0845678aad6d96e0ffbfda" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]That's right.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Our doctor,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the ranger,
[etc:Wait frame="8"/]and our pilot.
DayCommon.DayCommon_Area500_Briefing_Common_03_P02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="adf398b1bf1f4623a5f0fe7d144544cf" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Kee-HEE![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Don't worry![etc:Wait frame="8"/] It should be easy
enough to find them.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="adf398b1bf1f4623a5f0fe7d144544cf" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]They're all wearing my custom-made,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
scientifically enhanced,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] ultra-high-
performance space suits![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="adf398b1bf1f4623a5f0fe7d144544cf" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]They could be stuck out there for another
century, and the suits would still be as
pristine as they were the day I made them.
DayCommon.DayCommon_Area500_Briefing_Common_03_P03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="827b91969b0a47bbb16d529593f38640" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]That's nice,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but I'm less worried about the
suits than I am the officers inside them.
DayCommon.DayCommon_Area500_Briefing_Common_04_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="f6ecf90ab66e4f07ae16f61fbfa19337" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Now that our ranger has been found safe
and sound,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the number of missing
Rescue Officers is [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]down to 2[System:Color name="Default"].
DayCommon.DayCommon_Area500_Briefing_Common_04_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="3437bf3041c14837b3d39a16d83d14e5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Correct.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Now we just need to find [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal10"/]Yonny[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]
and [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Pilot"/]Bernard[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="3437bf3041c14837b3d39a16d83d14e5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ThinkFaceOnly"/]Though we can't ignore the fact that the
latter may now be a leafling.
DayCommon.DayCommon_Area500_Briefing_Common_04_P02: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="83d2843969a84a5e9e11a9c3e7b1467d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]No, we can't.
DayCommon.DayCommon_Area500_Briefing_Common_04_P03: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="2ea1b2ff4b0a4ce9b31737849ba58e57" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Either way,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] we've got to rescue him ASAP!
DayCommon.DayCommon_Area500_Briefing_Common_04_P04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="4bb0e8e2c9df44bea5bc4422b3452365" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]While we search for the castaways,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
we'll expand our efforts to rescue the
leaflings as well.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="4bb0e8e2c9df44bea5bc4422b3452365" Scale="1"/]If we locate [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal10"/]Yonny[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] he may find a way to
cure the leaflings of their leafy state.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="4bb0e8e2c9df44bea5bc4422b3452365" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]Keep up the good work,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] and get back out
there.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Rescue work is never done!
DayCommon.DayCommon_Area500_Briefing_Common_05_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="6f77624bf0c64fdb8d4dc9d4bfbf704f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]The only officer still at large is
our pilot,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Pilot"/]Bernard[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].
DayCommon.DayCommon_Area500_Briefing_Common_05_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="00bd8f97f17846d7bdd367367e963a5f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]Hmm...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It's unfortunate, to say the least.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="00bd8f97f17846d7bdd367367e963a5f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]We should consider the possibility that he
wasn't turned into a leafling after all but
has simply escaped our notice.
DayCommon.DayCommon_Area500_Briefing_Common_05_P02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="54cebd51d0f94b3c8c3fcfb1588bfbb6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]If only we could get our hands on that
leafling—the one with the pup—and make
him tell us where our pilot is!
DayCommon.DayCommon_Area500_Briefing_Common_05_P03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="519ff8be008a4d2c8c0757e017aa7d53" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/]Hey.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] This is the Rescue Corps.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] That type
of interrogation goes against everything
we stand for.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="519ff8be008a4d2c8c0757e017aa7d53" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]That said,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] if we're going to make any
progress,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] we do need to talk to that
leafling.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] And soon.
DayCommon.DayCommon_Area500_Briefing_Common_05_P04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="0e9ca380133849f88da5bcbba3bc6a6e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Daytime exploration,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] night expeditions...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
We need to pull out all the stops.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="0e9ca380133849f88da5bcbba3bc6a6e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly"/]Except, apparently,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] a stop that includes
a good night's sleep.
DayCommon.DayCommon_Area500_Briefing_Common_06_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="0c6ced4eccf34042a1e1eca74ef62022" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Alriiight...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] The time has come to start
harvesting ingredients for the medicine.
DayCommon.DayCommon_Area500_Briefing_Common_06_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="b6acd8bd41484c2a873670d22f5d991b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]That means you'll be going out on night
expeditions![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Be sure to bring some of my
inventions with you, [Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/].
DayCommon.DayCommon_Area500_Briefing_Common_06_P02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="b9d481d5f733438eb8e55b52375389b3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Oh yes![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Creatures are much more active
at night,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you know.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Eheheh!
DayCommon.DayCommon_Area500_Briefing_Common_06_P03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="dc88718f18984262b3389efabf6b7c03" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Kee-hee![etc:Wait frame="15"/] And you'll have no trouble at all
with those creatures,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] thanks to my
scientific breakthroughs!
DayCommon.DayCommon_Area500_Briefing_Common_06_P04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="46617a7f745e446c8238c71187a573d8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]I suppose there is such a thing as being
TOO confident.
DayCommon.DayCommon_Area500_Briefing_Common_07_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="c8fe99d281d444fe993de9128060a434" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Nighttime expeditions are very dangerous.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Please be even more cautious than usual.
DayCommon.DayCommon_Area500_Briefing_Common_07_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="49fc40899f1043109a14e4309c80c92d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]And remember to prepare [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] properly.
[etc:Wait frame="15"/]An ounce of prevention is worth a pound
of cure.
DayCommon.DayCommon_Area500_Briefing_Common_07_P02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="a21992591a2745a1990dd91de762daca" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Speaking of cures,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] remember to harvest
lots of that medicinal ingredient.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] We'll need
as much as we can get our hands on...
DayCommon.DayCommon_Area500_Briefing_Common_07_P03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="165a3a281fdf4d88bb80facb1c01d632" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]And take advantage of my inventions while
you're at it![etc:Wait frame="15"/] The field-application data you
collect is priceless to my work.
DayCommon.DayCommon_Area500_Briefing_Common_07_P04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="3798359a50eb4fc59b1867ca186e998a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]All that helpful advice is for the sake of
[Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'm sure.
DayCommon.DayCommon_Area500_Briefing_Common_08_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="e646c5362e3b4f649b4abdc8f38a8af9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]I'm so relieved that the medicine actually
cured the leafling!
DayCommon.DayCommon_Area500_Briefing_Common_08_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="eba9390ef184469eb8f337c07a7657fe" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Eheheh,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I couldn't have done it without all
that glow sap.
DayCommon.DayCommon_Area500_Briefing_Common_08_P02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="1f87d46d16f445c58342156ee92538e7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I'm just grateful I won't be needing any of
[Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal10"/]Yonny[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s medicine...
DayCommon.DayCommon_Area500_Briefing_Common_08_P03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="5743b911ddb8404ab44a1ca0d7add765" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]Huh.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] But didn't he give you some
medicine that time you were having
trouble sleeping?
DayCommon.DayCommon_Area500_Briefing_Common_08_P04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="4cf659ec5a3848c0aa26ccf1fbd4462c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]He did.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] And after I took it, I slept for two
days straight.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] To be fair,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] it was effective.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Just...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]too effective.
DayCommon.DayCommon_Area500_Briefing_Common_08_P05: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="37186a50673447faba282b15235de901" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]I wonder what was in that medicine...
DayCommon.DayCommon_Area500_Briefing_Common_09_P00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="3d01ddeb846d4619bcd291fb3dd520f5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Pilot"/]Bernard[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]![etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'm so happy you're alright!
DayCommon.DayCommon_Area500_Briefing_Common_09_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Pilot"/][UE:Meta key="d0e5b500e3d04747b97beb9784f8d1dd" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]I'm sorry to make you all worry.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="d0e5b500e3d04747b97beb9784f8d1dd" Scale="1"/]But before I forget...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] WHERE is my
leftover pizza?
DayCommon.DayCommon_Area500_Briefing_Common_09_P02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="b92439e739594a449496f350a36349e0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Kee-hee![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Finally,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the team is back
together![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Thanks in no small part to the
marvels of science.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] That I invented!
DayCommon.DayCommon_Area500_Briefing_Common_09_P03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="a7d3e753d8e44fd5a91978d2f388e6a7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/]Hey![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Move over and give me some space!
[etc:Wait frame="15"/]These seats are way too small...
DayCommon.DayCommon_Area500_Briefing_Common_09_P04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="c5f50a5fdb9b48d990bb29c45964af3a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Should I whip up an invisibility serum?[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
It would at least provide the illusion of
more space.
DayCommon.DayCommon_Area500_Briefing_Common_09_P05:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="c12de19ae986428ebd9277ceabbca15c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/], no![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Drop it![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Pizza is NFSD![etc:Wait frame="8"/]
Not for space dogs!
DayCommon.DayCommon_Area500_Briefing_Common_09_P06:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="e13674574ce54735af87e7e4a21abe76" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Things got back to normal a little too
quickly, I think.
DayCommon.DayCommon_Area500_Briefing_Common_10_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="5d3e5e89d69d46aa88345ad78be45295" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="CaptainOlimar"/]Captain Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] must be somewhere inside
that structure...
DayCommon.DayCommon_Area500_Briefing_Common_10_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="d7a2dd0d78404e62ba615d19382f4e6d" Scale="1"/]We need to search that place top to
bottom.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It won't be easy,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but we have no
choice.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Be thorough, [Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/].
DayCommon.DayCommon_Area500_Briefing_Common_10_P02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="1aa40a278919434a9344087ee6ea49cc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]We'll be here the whole time to help in
whatever way we can!
DayCommon.DayCommon_Area500_Briefing_Common_11_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="9b4abea32b93462ca4f15158246d955a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]I can't believe it...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] That leafling is really
[Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="CaptainOlimar"/]Captain Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]?!
DayCommon.DayCommon_Area500_Briefing_Common_11_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="06cb5e074cbf49568a100b15982a4bf4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I'm a bit surprised myself,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but it's a
strong possibility.
DayCommon.DayCommon_Area500_Briefing_Common_11_P02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="e1b31a13e94f4214b30895a33d332e93" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]The dog,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the locked shelter...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It all lines up
with what's in the Voyage Log...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="e1b31a13e94f4214b30895a33d332e93" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="AngryFaceOnly2"/]But to rescue that leafling,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] we're going to
need a true Dandori master.
DayCommon.DayCommon_Area500_Briefing_Common_11_P03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="fd1a0cc21ac641a4b9d8c41c09b1c769" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Then that's what we'll give them.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Go show
that leafling all the Dandori skills you've
got in your arsenal, rookie!
DayCommon.DayCommon_Area500_Briefing_Common_12_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="dd7624cbdcc34ae4b58d01a1973657ad" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Eheheh![etc:Wait frame="8"/] The only thing left to do now is
administer the cure to [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="CaptainOlimar"/]Captain Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
or that leafling that may be [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="CaptainOlimar"/]Captain Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="dd7624cbdcc34ae4b58d01a1973657ad" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Ready, new blood?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'll need you to collect
the glow sap that will one day run through
his veins.
DayCommon.DayCommon_Area500_Briefing_Common_12_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="baaa328306694e30a7371bcb8a7a7499" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Don't be so pushy, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal10"/]Yonny[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="baaa328306694e30a7371bcb8a7a7499" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]You know how utterly terrifying those
night expeditions can be.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Which is why I
will supply plenty of gear and items.
DayCommon.DayCommon_Area500_Briefing_Common_12_P02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="d7178a5409234169bd3f5c2e63413943" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal03"/]Russ[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] is correct.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="d7178a5409234169bd3f5c2e63413943" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="CommandFaceOnly"/]We need to prepare as much as physically
possible![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Even if that means collecting raw
material from every corner of this planet.
DayCommon.DayCommon_Area500_Briefing_Common_12_P03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="20513026296e473895974bf0b85a2764" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]That could take a while...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] We'd like to
actually cure the guy eventually.
DayCommon.DayCommon_Area500_Briefing_Check_Area003:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="1895f71a9ffa4737ba1cf443f86d85d0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="CaptainOlimar"/]Captain Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/][etc:Wait frame="8"/] isn't the only castaway out
there in need of rescue.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="5e7d8a3b1b034f5e881f8531ae56b898" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]It doesn't matter how many there are—
it's our job to help them all.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="5e7d8a3b1b034f5e881f8531ae56b898" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]When we rescue every last one of them
and get them off this planet,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] our names
will go down in Rescue Corps history.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="5e7d8a3b1b034f5e881f8531ae56b898" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]I should probably start preparing my
comments for all the interviews...

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="766e4a80e6c44cea8f90b67672b617d7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]You, uh,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] may be getting ahead of yourself
there, Captain...
DayCommon.DayCommon_Area500_Briefing_Noprogress_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="7cb04db5331b4fe39edb8cb93a5681ed" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]When I look at [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'm reminded of all
the past generations of Rescue Pups...

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="63ce17f544d84eba93a2ecd04e2105d0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]You know, Captain,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I've always wondered...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
do all your memories involve Rescue Pups?

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="e91fa9942f2c42a7aa28dcb90d416c5d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]I don't think so...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I have this one memory
from my childhood that's about a
completely different type of animal.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="e91fa9942f2c42a7aa28dcb90d416c5d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]My class took a field trip to the mountains,
and I got lost somehow. [System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="e91fa9942f2c42a7aa28dcb90d416c5d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Obie"/]These wild animals with dark, sparkling
eyes surrounded me.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I thought I was
done for...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="e91fa9942f2c42a7aa28dcb90d416c5d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Until...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]out of the bushes jumped the
Rescue Pup at the time.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] She saved
me that day.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="59107ea43fc34f9ca189bdd3f2ce33e1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Huh.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Hold on...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Isn't that still a memory of a
Rescue Pup?
DayCommon.DayCommon_Area500_Briefing_Noprogress_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="43485bb74520496da5d1f13852f995ee" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]Captain,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] what do you like to do on your
days off?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Do you have hobbies or anything
like that?

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="d22d3728908e4287a9fd46313c8e586c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Hmm.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Well...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]I guess I consider training and
walking Rescue Pups to be my hobbies.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="d22d3728908e4287a9fd46313c8e586c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly2"/]Though sometimes we throw balls or have
a little chase...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Brushing them is fun too!
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="b24b568279d54e79807bec902e2589d7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Sounds like your hobby is...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]dogs.
DayCommon.DayCommon_Area500_Briefing_Noprogress_03: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="8a5cce875b6f4cc7a2d4780c325ae813" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Are we really doing all we can here?
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="45b1b333009e439a817dd039710b7f84" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]Huh?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Is everything alright, Captain?

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="9d330a41d7df481a885f4296c7c7636b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I just can't help wondering...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]is there
something more we could do?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Is any
of this enough?

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="dc54bb7e3ff240918ae323b6622a63ad" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Well,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I know there are more ways to help
others, besides rescuing them.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="dc54bb7e3ff240918ae323b6622a63ad" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly2"/]And if you really do feel like we need to
go beyond this,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] to truly do more...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]I'll be
right behind you, Captain!

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="9967acd968284d30bd87eef22a683569" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]I'm glad to hear that, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal01"/]Collin[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Then you won't
mind giving the Rescue Pup a nice, long
bath.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] And don't forget to cut his nails.
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="70190a9c793b4c0baf2462687a53dab2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Now I REALLY wish I could turn back time.
DayCommon.DayCommon_Area500_Briefing_Noprogress_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="08172e5a451a4f1a87224920fd5651a3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal01"/]Collin[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] could you explain to me how our
wireless-communication devices actually
work?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'm curious.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="bba780538be64ade85111b5a5577447d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]How do they work?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Great question.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Let's
see,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] how do I explain it...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="bba780538be64ade85111b5a5577447d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Basically, your recorded voice is turned
into a signal and transmitted from an
antenna,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] then another antenna picks it up.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="bba780538be64ade85111b5a5577447d" Scale="1"/]That signal is also called an RF,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] or radio
frequency.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Then you've got your amplitude
and phase,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] plus your electrical fields...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="bba780538be64ade85111b5a5577447d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Does that make any sense?

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="27460bf5d49f4121be932895551030d8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Uh,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I think so.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] So,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the device transmits an
antenna, and the radio phase frequents a
signal.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Got it!
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="327d81e6f37e40e6b5547d9e6455342e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Hmm.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'm not quite sure you do.
DayCommon.DayCommon_Area500_Briefing_Noprogress_05:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="6a5dec46f9f949c39c5d3b548299dabd" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]You know,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I haven't been sleeping too well
lately.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I think I'm going to turn in early...

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="0ef27ac38dbb42ed95fbed36bb6f6585" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Solid plan.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I may actually do the same.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I haven't been sleeping too well myself.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="46db79a0b40d4e0784255cf78ee639bb" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]I think I've just been so on edge since the
start of this mission.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Even at night I feel
like I always need to be ready.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="ced1ea16d3ad48f7bae266a3d2f91f11" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Same here.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'm lucky if I get anything
over nine hours of sleep a night lately.
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="3cc454717cdd411392bdb786a4edc56f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]...[etc:Wait frame="15"/]So you totally get it.
DayCommon.DayCommon_Area500_Briefing_Noprogress_06:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="475ffbe00f7a4cd289b20030ba68b15c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]I'm honestly impressed, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal03"/]Russ[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You seem to
be a nonstop invention machine.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="0f7cdd80e6b543ba9fefc50f78930229" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Honestly,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the work I do in the Lab just
comes naturally to me.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It's as instinctive
as the act of breathing or sleeping.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="32b4222f2ccf40e7aa6fa091f36cd3ba" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]If that's the case,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] then our rookie here
is like a lifeline for you, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal03"/]Russ[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[etc:Wait frame="15"/] The raw
materials are your nourishment.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="6454a18482f2423e81a0114916d73aa4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]It almost sounds like as long as you have
enough raw materials,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you don't need to
sleep or eat.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="b5c78496f78d477a9d7bd036af78b7a7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]Hold on now.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] That's not quite what I
was saying...
DayCommon.DayCommon_Area500_Briefing_Noprogress_07:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="7db51628a2fb4dffb4a80f7a1120378d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]The raw materials on this planet are
fascinating![etc:Wait frame="15"/] I could spend my whole life
researching them and still need more time!

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="ac3552d3f1284ab3826fb837bf029e8c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]You know we're heading home once our
rescue duties are complete,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] right?[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Please say yes.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="95ceb7cf0581473abcfe23d8d0423591" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Hmm...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] If [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal03"/]Russ[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] moved here permanently,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
we could finally get rid of that cluttered
lab and turn it into a break room.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="03ab70401e68469da72a7a93c0386d05" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]I doubt I could actually stay here forever...[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Not when Mother is back home waiting.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="03ab70401e68469da72a7a93c0386d05" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SurpriseFaceOnly2"/]Wait.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] What was that, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal01"/]Collin[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="03ab70401e68469da72a7a93c0386d05" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/]What did you say, now?
DayCommon.DayCommon_Area500_Briefing_Noprogress_08:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="2611b5bea0dc4b2eaa9b258028732358" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Now that we have [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal06"/]Dingo[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] back,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] our rescue
operations should go a lot smoother.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="ffcfde8573484c35a0c20dd5eaa2b27f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Obviously.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] First things first—I'll get that
newbie into shape.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="455151a6c5e74421a83f6628493c78ee" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]And, uh,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] when were you thinking of
returning to the field yourself, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal06"/]Dingo[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]?

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="2a69cbc6291e4d57b94cef0f6c5706ab" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Listen,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] comms guy.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] If star performers like
me aren't at 100 percent when the sap
hits the asphalt,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] we're basically useless.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="2a69cbc6291e4d57b94cef0f6c5706ab" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="AngryFaceOnly"/]The captain gets it,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] which is why she
ordered me to rest up.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="9878e3bf89db485799557395523cf640" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Are you sure the captain's not going too
easy on you, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal06"/]Dingo[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]?
DayCommon.DayCommon_Area500_Briefing_Noprogress_09:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="910b173ea638475c9e0f2ed8060ce1fe" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal06"/]Dingo[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] would you agree that daily training
is the most efficient way to keep one's
body in top condition?

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="db46eb1abafd409790e3f9f336d4a1ee" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/]Huh?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You got a problem with my workout
routine,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] science guy?

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="17a7ad63b3a74ed38b5241585a0fe415" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Kee-HEE![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Not at all![etc:Wait frame="8"/] It's simply that a
ranger's body is their best tool.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Wouldn't
you like the chance to enhance yours?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="17a7ad63b3a74ed38b5241585a0fe415" Scale="1"/]You can contribute to the advancement of
science![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Be my guinea pig![etc:Wait frame="8"/] I just need you
to stress test some new gear...

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="60b6499878634d30af3da9be918052c5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Obie"/]Um,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I didn't survive without injury just to
subject my body to science-fiction test
shenanigans.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'll pass.
DayCommon.DayCommon_Area500_Briefing_Noprogress_10:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="f760235cdef743848518ad5846ac1534" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]Heeey, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal03"/]Russ[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Has the gear you've been
giving to "new blood" to use out in the field
been experimentally verified...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]or not?

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="79fbac314e6a4b5b92976dab2249b5c0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/]I refuse to even entertain such insulting
insinuations.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I have their knowing consent,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
so let's just leave it at that.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="79fbac314e6a4b5b92976dab2249b5c0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="AngryFaceOnly"/]It's not as if I'm handing out untested and
unproven medicines without a care in the
world.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Unlike SOME individuals.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="54c44fce54ea4d94a082f353d2e98529" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]If you're referencing that...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]vitamin booster,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
you may recall that it worked wonders on
the captain.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="f4df3071cfee48c5a96b39995965e6cf" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]It was a wonder she didn't fire you after
that "vitamin booster" made her toes swell
up to the size of dumplings!
DayCommon.DayCommon_Area500_Briefing_Noprogress_11:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="9062e3fabd3b4a30b7d9202873384271" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]Sooo, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal06"/]Dingo[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] When was the last time you
talked to anyone back home?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Spoken with
your parents recently?

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="22c02c0fd6d54e7abf9938c1ff681ff6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]What now, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal01"/]Yon[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Didn't figure you were the
type to get homesick.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="29ac59444932420faa1bb65fd0c6d25f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]No,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but the depth of the darkness we
experience on this planet...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Doesn't it
remind you of our village?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="29ac59444932420faa1bb65fd0c6d25f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]I keep thinking back to that night when you
got lost on the mountain.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Everyone in town
was in hysterics!

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="595eb849566a4603a88d5fb414a579c6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Hey,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you ever thought about creating a
medicine that erases embarr...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]uh,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] boring
memories?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I think you could use some.
DayCommon.DayCommon_Area500_Briefing_Noprogress_12:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="13e4727191ec43868d09c2cf4ac52c52" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Pilot"/]Bernard[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I've always wanted to ask you
something...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Why do you talk like THIS?

[Npc:Icon chara="Pilot"/][UE:Meta key="4fb068184783434cbe830d5d6153f504" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Intrigued by the way I TALK,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] are WE?[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Well,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] there's actually a story behind it.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
It's pretty interesting too.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="4fb068184783434cbe830d5d6153f504" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ThinkFaceOnly"/]To give you the full picture,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] we need to go
way, WAY back.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] A LONG time ago,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] when I
was still a youngster...
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="5bcf4404af4b4452a4a9096bfde18045" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Know what?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Never mind.

[Npc:Icon chara="Pilot"/][UE:Meta key="b0fcdcb0d70447ee9d65375be9c0c4ee" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]What?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] But it was just about to get GOOD![etc:Wait frame="15"/]
There's excitement,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] DRAMA!

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="e677ef314398484f958f150bc6c9f726" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]I guess I'm just worried if I listen to you for
too long,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'LL start talking like that TOO.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="e677ef314398484f958f150bc6c9f726" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SurpriseFaceOnly2"/]Oh NO!
DayCommon.DayCommon_Area500_Briefing_Noprogress_13:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="4b99e6e12aaa48308de36b0acdec7d54" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]What kind of beings are these leaflings,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
I wonder.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Perhaps if I wield the scalpel of
science,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'll be able to carve out the truth.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="d2f62ed4ca904a03b004ac4b1573661b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]We do need to learn more about the
leaflings,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] if only to make my cure all
the more effective.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="39b66c1a63164a0a8bedaa1ca825899d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]That said...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]as members of the Rescue
Corps,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] we cannot perform our tests on
any average member of the public.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="7ed84364658d4e82aac061de635155bd" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Indeed,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but what if we could experiment
on someone less...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]average?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] We do have a
colleague with firsthand experience,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] eheh.

[Npc:Icon chara="Pilot"/][UE:Meta key="e330f85d64b6423bbedb8a327fbc5d60" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Obie"/][System:Color name="NoVoice" ]My ears are burning,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] and NOT in a good
way.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Why does it suddenly feel like I'm
being watched,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] hoo?![System:Color name="Default"]
DayCommon.DayCommon_Area500_Briefing_Noprogress_14:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="59ff791fc4494b66a219377f5163554e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Pilot"/]Bernard[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I've been trying to recount the
events of the crash.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Did anything odd
happen while you were at the helm?

[Npc:Icon chara="Pilot"/][UE:Meta key="c0ce5559c4754bb0aa082ffc89f32164" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Funny you should ask.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Someone with my
skills should have been able to make a
landing like that with their EYES closed![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="c0ce5559c4754bb0aa082ffc89f32164" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SurpriseFaceOnly2"/]But, hoo! [etc:Wait frame="8"/]Shortly after entering the
planet's atmosphere,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the ship became
almost IMPOSSIBLE to control.

[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="0d6924ea38f9408ab578c40a08203dda" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Hmm...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] The S.S. Dolphin crash-landed on
this planet after being hit by a meteorite.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="0d6924ea38f9408ab578c40a08203dda" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]But thinking back on it,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] it did feel like I was
being pulled toward the planet by some
inexplicably strong force.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="da12e4735c4a48dbb93438a16026c9c1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Perhaps it was the will of some being or
entity...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]or the will of the planet itself
pulling us all into its orbit...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="da12e4735c4a48dbb93438a16026c9c1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly2"/]Kee-hee-HEE![etc:Wait frame="8"/] That sounds like something
straight out of a science-fiction novel![etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Completely ridiculous...
DayCommon.DayCommon_Area500_Briefing_Noprogress_15:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="5c5155c55b464eedbf63893541afb525" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]It seems like all of a sudden we have so
many more rescues to complete.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] At this
rate,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] we may never be going home.

[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="36fa7e41085d4eaabd4b4e0a40ef983e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]My SOS signal probably didn't help
matters.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'm sorry to have caused the
Rescue Corps so much more work.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="3072d84dc62e4f8f8c3636cfd712ac84" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Don't worry about it, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="CaptainOlimar"/]Captain Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
This is our job after all.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="3072d84dc62e4f8f8c3636cfd712ac84" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly2"/]It doesn't matter how many castaways we
come across on this planet.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] We'll save
every last one!

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="b3099df7120244c8a352723f989e42ac" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]And then,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] once [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] is cured,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] we'll all
fly home together.
DayCommon.DayCommon_Area500_Briefing_Noprogress_16:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="f652add4587c4ad88c4f540175cc678d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]Hey![etc:Wait frame="15"/] [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Charlie"/]Don Bergman[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] right?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I heard you used
to be a ranger.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="f652add4587c4ad88c4f540175cc678d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ThinkFaceOnly"/]But now you're a treasure hunter,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] huh?
[etc:Wait frame="15"/]Seems like an odd career change.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="c2d51d2670494dd1b8d2021c3ac2ef39" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal06"/]Dingo[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Don't be rude!

[Npc:Icon chara="Charlie"/][UE:Meta key="69ef0a6951c64e6181576e0e2d37796c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]It's alright.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I became a treasure hunter as
a way to earn the money I needed to help
the communities on my planet.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="69ef0a6951c64e6181576e0e2d37796c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="AngryFaceOnly2"/]The way I think about it,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'm still serving
the same purpose.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Whether I'm a ranger
or not.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="46b8b2f74d3a455cbed596af17bb3e89" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Well...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]that's kinda beautiful.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I could almost
cry.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] But I won't![etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'll just become a treasure
hunter too!

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="97a7f210adef4f45a10bfad04bfe7d18" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]That's a nice sentiment,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but if [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal06"/]Dingo[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] lacks
one thing...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]it's follow-through.
DayCommon.DayCommon_Area500_Briefing_Noprogress_17:
[Npc:Icon chara="Brittany"/][UE:Meta key="df87c3ea7e52481dbedca9aa535af66e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]To be honest,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I have absolutely no idea
why anyone in their right mind would want
to become an officer in the Rescue Corps.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="df87c3ea7e52481dbedca9aa535af66e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]I can't imagine voluntarily putting my life
in danger just to rescue somebody else's.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="dfbb0749ad814246aee07d79056350f8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]"If one is in need of rescue, then we must
heed their call."[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I believe that with every
fiber of my being.

[Npc:Icon chara="Brittany"/][UE:Meta key="a2719bc70b8c4c3daa067e75b820768e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Of course.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] And if there weren't brave
souls like yourself out there,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the rest of
us would still be stranded.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="a2719bc70b8c4c3daa067e75b820768e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]So,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] thank you.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I understand that it is a
noble calling.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] One I don't think I could
answer without the promise of a reward...
DayCommon.DayCommon_Area500_Briefing_Noprogress_18:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="cc4df98ba31542c78f49f8efcf0d7f3f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Thanks to the Rescue Corps,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I will finally
be reunited with my family back home on
Hocotate.
[Npc:Icon chara="Louie"/][UE:Meta key="1c2e2a83a71e41e5a3e28557e4ed6134" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Don't wanna...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]go.

[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="6995c35ac09f492b9d2682592a7b4651" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Then what exactly is it that you do want,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
[Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Louie"/]Louie[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'm still not sure.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6995c35ac09f492b9d2682592a7b4651" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly2"/]Just be honest with me.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I won't get mad,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
I promise.
[Npc:Icon chara="Louie"/][UE:Meta key="cc8fb89cd34c4eccb0ab4a2ff3b5203a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Food![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Tasty snacks!

[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="27eb713504c846fea7f19d453d4238a9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]I may never understand you, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Louie"/]Louie[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
But you can't say that I didn't try.
DayCommon.DayCommon_Area500_Briefing_Noprogress_19:
[Npc:Icon chara="Charlie"/][UE:Meta key="9820c22332e84ed6af4e0acd9a72826a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]You know,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] this whole shipwreck episode
has been a good opportunity to really think
about my future.

[Npc:Icon chara="Alph"/][UE:Meta key="0789ef8b6762484a9bd6d7896e50edc3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Agreed.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Since being rescued,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I've been
wondering if it's about time for me to
make some changes.

[Npc:Icon chara="Brittany"/][UE:Meta key="fcafd6a945cd445a8ad1fba70398d590" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]Really?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Are your days as treasure
hunters coming to an end?

[Npc:Icon chara="Charlie"/][UE:Meta key="f3184d2a31754a8ba522d6c7b7bbcc27" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Well,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I just can't help but wonder if buying
food with the money I make from treasure
hunting makes any real difference...

[Npc:Icon chara="Alph"/][UE:Meta key="716aadea7403451996d3d12c53825251" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Exactly![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Maybe everything we've been
doing up to now is just buying time.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] We
need a real solution to the food crisis.

[Npc:Icon chara="Brittany"/][UE:Meta key="7f86abac90214f748aca71c7f5f9ae3d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]You finally figured that out,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] huh?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'm quite
impressed by your progress.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Both of you.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="7f86abac90214f748aca71c7f5f9ae3d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]Now that I think about it...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]maybe I should
stick around with the two of you for a little
longer.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] See if I can help...
